column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I feel like every time I come here
column2: I just end up eating the patatas bravas
column3: the goat cheese with bread and sangria.  I can't say I am ever not satisfied with these tried and true staples.  The potatoes come with this spicy mayo that at times runs out faster than the potatoes themselves
column4: but if you ask for more
column5: they will give you a plate of the stuff which is pretty much 5 times more than you normally get.  We also tried the fried green peppers.  They come out looking like straight serranos
column7: but they really are no hotter than a sweet pepper.
